```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```


```{r}
bird_collision <- read.csv("data/bird_collision.csv")
```

```{r}
bird_collision <- bird_collision %>% 
  select(!(starts_with("scaled")))
```

```{r}
collisions_date_sep <- bird_collision %>% 
  separate(col="date", into = c("month","day","year"), sep = "/") %>% 
  select(!day) %>% 
  mutate(month=as.factor(month))
```

Collisions by month:

```{r}
collisions_date_sep %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=month,y=count))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  coord_cartesian(y=c(0,30))
```

Collisions by building:

```{r}
bird_collision %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=building,y=count))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  coord_cartesian(y=c(0,30))
```

Collisions vs building height:

```{r}
bird_collision %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=ceiling_height,y=count))+
  geom_point()+
  coord_cartesian(y=c(0,30))
```

Collisions vs visibility:

```{r}
bird_collision %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=visibility_distance,y=count))+
  geom_point()
```

Collisions vs migration amount:

```{r}
bird_collision %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=amt,y=count))+
  geom_point()
```
